attributes.action: inform Fred Goodwin formed chairman of RBS that we the following undersigned UK taxpayers call upon him to donate his enormous pension either to UK charities or to the UK treasury as a way of making amends.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Perhaps public support can do what the law cannot.
The UK treasury says"
"Since they became aware of this issue UKFI have been vigorously pursuing with the new Chairman whether there is any scope for clawing back some or all of this pension entitlement and whether the Board took the decision in the full knowledge of the facts."
As it may not be legally possible to claw the money back from Fred's pension.  This money may never be recovered.  However he himself could decide that he really was sorry for the situation and give it away to charity or back to the people.
